description: A+ Student Organizer, the most popular webOS student organizer, is now in version 2.0!!!  Working Smarter, Not Harder just got much easier.  This is a HUGE update which includes TONS of new features.  Version 2.0 has a completely redesigned  user interface, lots of new functionality, and a faster database.  Not familiar with A+ Student Organizer???  A+ Student Organizer is an app which makes it easy organize the important details of your student life.  With this app you will always know what your schedule is, what your grades are, which tests and assignments are coming up, and what you need to do right now to get the grades you want.  A+ Student Organizer includes many time saving features such as like the ability to add your entire schedule to your device calendar in just a few taps and a built in To-Do list for your school work.  Furthermore, expect to see many new updates soon as part of this new update is support built into the new database for many of the new features everyone has been requesting.  Purchase A+ Student Organizer today and to start Working Smarter, Not Harder to get the grades you want! This is the full version with no restrictions on how much data you can store and version 2.0 is a free update to anyone who has already purchased the app.
versionNote: Small bug fixes.  New overdue task tag.
